Aapn jya vyaktishi bolat aahat tyanni aapla call hold var thevla aahe. Krupaya line var raha. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Krupaya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aapn jya vyaktishi bolat aahat tyanni aapla call hold var thevla aahe. Krupaya line var raha.
Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai.

summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a call from Abhijit Lakhanpal.

- Customer is angry about receiving unwanted calls.

- Customer claims IndiaMART representatives lied to him.



Resolution:

- Executive put the call on hold to investigate.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- unwanted calls, package, verification, executive
